title: 90/510/EEC: First Council Decision of 9 October 1990 on the extension of the legal protection of topographies of semiconductor products to persons from certain countries and territories
header:
FIRST  COUNCIL DECISION
of 9 October 1990
on the extension of the legal protection of topographies of semiconductor products to persons from certain countries and territories
(90/510/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Decision shall apply from 8 November 1990.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 9 October 1990.
For the Council
The President
P. ROMITA
